document.docAuthor: Bosmans, Robert, Cardoso, Pedro & Crespo, Luis Carlos
document.masterDocTitle: A review of the linyphiid spiders of Portugal, with the description of six new species (Araneae: Linyphiidae) 2473

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A review of the linyphiid spiders of Portugal, with the description of six new species (Araneae: Linyphiidae) 2473

subSubSection.paragraph:
Description: Wiehle (1956: 197 , figs 331–335), van
Helsdingen et al . (1977: 17
, figs 16–18, 58), Roberts (1987: 150 , fig. 78c).

.
Distribution: Europe, North Africa, introduced elsewhere.

Habitat type :
Found in large numbers close to rivers and in damp forests, but also in all other
type of habitats, as also pointed out by Ribera & Hormiga (1986) in Catalunya
..
Phenology: All year long except July and August.
